location: Near Fengji Huangju (豐基皇居) building
notes: Clean, newly renovated empty unit with modern polished tile floors, crystal ceiling lights, and wall-mounted AC. The apartment is unfurnished with good natural light from large windows. For baby safety: the tile floors are slippery, and one bedroom has floor-to-ceiling windows that would need child safety measures. Being on the 3rd floor of a 15-story building strongly suggests elevator access.
